name: Blocks of Nine
description:
Blocks Of Nine

Is a work your brain game where you try to remove all blocks from each level. You have some special tools to help you with this. 

You have the Shift all Left Tool. 
This tool is the Arrow on the right, the number is how many of them you have to use.

You have the Color Remover Tool.
This Tool is the Four colored Squares that spin on the right side. As it sounds this will allow you to remove all Blocks on the level of a color.  Use these carefully as they are hard to earn.
Red Blocks Wild---Is the final tool red blocks are special they can be removed from the level no matter how many are connected.  All other blocks must have at least 3 connected blocks.

Save Game

Each level you complete is auto saved.  To continue your game click the Load gear on the main menu. starting a new game will erase the old saved game.

How To Remove Blocks

At its base you must have 3 connected blocks to drop them out.

As you start you are trying to remove the most blocks you can each time you click on the blocks.

On levels 1 to 4 if you remove 7 or more connected blocks you earn Color Remover.  They will be a real help in the long run so try to 
get as many as you can.

Levels 5 to 8 you need 8 or more connected to earn Color Remover Tool. Over level 8 you  will need 9 connected.

You get a Shift All Left Tool when you remove 6 or more connected blocks.
